type PersonalizationStateInfoCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供 和 物件的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組以集合為基礎的包裝函式和執行個體。The class provides a collection-based wrapper over a set of and instances. 藉由依序逐一查看集合，循序索引或索引鍵的值，會擷取這些執行個體。These instances are retrieved by iterating sequentially over the collection, by ordinal index or by key value. 執行個體的路徑和使用者名稱組合上編製索引。Instances are indexed on a combination of path and user name. 這是必要的因為執行個體表示共用的資料編製索引根據物件，而執行個體編製索引根據物件和物件。This is necessary because instances representing shared data are indexed according to object, whereas instances are indexed according to both a object and a object. 資訊的物件會保留在集合中從提供者所接收的順序。The information objects are maintained in the collection in the order in which they were received from the provider. 集合不會嘗試變更執行個體的順序，或維護集合中特定的排序次序。The collection does not attempt to change the order of the instances or maintain a specific sort order within the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回可以逐一查看集合的標準列舉值。

span.span: Returns a standard enumerator capable of iterating over the collection.
This method cannot be inherited.
An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置，未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的方法。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 如需有關列舉值的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on enumerators, see . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出對 集合的存取是否為同步 (具備執行緒安全)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果對集合的存取是同步處理的，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the collection is synchronized; otherwise, .

value.span: 該值對於 Web 組件控制項集合建立的 物件來說一定是 。

span.span: The value is always for objects created by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 屬性會傳回物件，這個物件可用來同步處理對 的存取。The property returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是集合的預設索引子。This property is the default indexer for the collection. 如果只有`path`提供，則屬性會傳回執行個體。If only `path` is provided, the property returns a instance. 如果兩個`path`並`username`提供，則屬性會傳回執行個體組合`path`和`username`。If both `path` and `username` are provided, the property returns a instance for the combination of `path` and `username`. 如果`path`(在案例中，`username`設為`null`) 不存在，或如果`username`並`path`不存在，`null`會傳回。If `path` (in the case that `username` is set to `null`) does not exist, or if `username` and `path` do not exist, `null` is returned.

summary.span: 從集合移除 衍生物件。

span.span: Removes a -derived object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會移除-從集合中衍生執行個體。This method removes a -derived instance from the collection. 已移除的執行個體之後的任何項目會往上移動以佔用空的位置。Any elements after the removed instance are moved up to occupy the vacant position. 就內部而言，集合的計數會減一。Internally, the count of the collection is decremented by one. 任何目前作用中，針對集合的列舉程式就會失效。Any enumerators currently active against the collection are invalidated. 如果只有`path`提供，則該路徑會移除執行個體。If only `path` is provided, then the instance for that path is removed. 如果兩個`path`並`username`提供，則組合的執行個體`path`和`username`會移除。If both `path` and `username` are provided, then the instance for the combination of `path` and `username` is removed. > [!NOTE] > 您可以嘗試從集合中，移除不存在的項目此動作將不會引發例外狀況。You can try to remove a non-existing item from the collection; this action will not raise an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試修改唯讀的集合，例如並，會擲回例外狀況。Methods that attempt to modify a read-only collection, such as and , throw a exception. > [!NOTE] > 您可以呼叫多次集合上的方法; 這將會引發例外狀況。You can call the method multiple times on the collection; this will not raise an exception.

value.span: Web 組件控制項集合會傳回目前集合物件的參考。

span.span: The Web Parts control set returns a reference to the current collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的集合使用的同步的版本屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized versions of the collection using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的集合，不是直接在集合本身。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection itself. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 特別是可以與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒，保持正常的同步處理。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
